Moderation.name: enable
args:
tracked_channels (String) : List of Channel IDs to track (separated by ;)
emoji (String) : The emoji used as a pin trigger
threshold (Integer) : Number of reactions needed to trigger the pin
mod_bypass (Integer) : If 1, a moderator can force the pin with a single reaction
pinning_channel (String) : ID of the channel where pin will be displayed
Moderation.comment: Enable the pinboard on your server (Mod Only)

Moderation.comment: Disable the pinboard on your server (Mod Only)

Moderation.name: see
Moderation.comment: See the pinboard settings on your server
